Direct Known Subclasses:

public abstract class XStreamConverter
extends Component
implements IDataProcessor

Base bean for using XStream, does XStream initialisation.

perryj

setUseXPP3

public void setUseXPP3(boolean useXPP3)
tells XStream to use XPP3 parser, default is not to use this

Parameters:
useXPP3 -

setAliasMap

public void setAliasMap(java.util.Map aliasMap)
sets map entries between xml elements and java classes that XStream will use. The keys are the xml element names, the values can either be Class objects or class names.
